summary: In Venice, a millionaire hires an actor to help him prank three greedy ex-girlfriends into thinking he's dying and leaving his fortune to one of them.
cast: Rex Harrison|Susan Hayward|Cliff Robertson|Capucine|Edie Adams|Maggie Smith|Adolfo Celi|Herschel Bernardi|Massimo Serato|Hugh Manning|David Dodimead|Antonio Corevi|Cy Grant|Frank Latimore|Carlos Alberto Valles|Raymond Burr|Mimmo Poli|Luigi Scavran
title: Mujeres en Venecia
